lead_paragraph: Arms Wide Open, a nonprofit competing for Pepsi Refresh funds charged in a complaint that rival, Progressive Slate, is a group of organizations with ties to the Democratic Party.
snippet: Arms Wide Open, a nonprofit competing for Pepsi Refresh funds charged in a complaint that rival, Progressive Slate, is a group of organizations with ties to the Democratic Party.

headline.main: Pepsi Refresh Contestant Claims Rules Were Broken
